activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#14120
activity.text: Hi maintainers, I'd like to have a go at this issue, please assign to me if you find my approach viable I've gone through the backend to understand the 'Severity' field, So this field is a string with three possible values: "`mild`", "`moderate`", and "`severe`". And it isn't a mandatory field (can be null) + there's no explicit default value. The API field name is `severity`. Here's my described solution plan: 1. define `severity` as union ("mild" | "moderate" | "severe" | null) 2. Implement Severity Input as **dropdown (select component)**: - Mild - Moderate - Severe - None (since `severity` can be null) 3. Display Severity in Questionnaire Responses and Patient Dashboard Expected Timeline: - Day 1: Setting up input field, and API interactions to POST `severity` field. - Day 2: Setting up `severity` card and API interactions to GET `severity` field. - Day 3: Color coding, applying icons for easy recognition, styling and through testing. - End date: 3 days
